overview: Temptress is Jenny, the editor and co-owner of SENSUAL CONFESSIONS, an erotic e-zine. One night as she's browsing through her subscribers' latest e-mails, she discovers stories so torrid she can't resist imagining herself as the centerpiece of all the wicked action. To Jenny, it's all in fun. After all, they're only fantasiesâ€¦ Or are they?
title: Sensual Confessions
